content.raw:
OK, I checked the results from SubT Virtual Urban \(BTW thanks for the new feature `robot_paths.svg` :slight_smile: \), and it looked fine for the first 4 runs but then 20 runs were bad \(the robot did not leave base station area, 5th run “on the edge”\). I posted some pictures on:

[https://robotika.cz/competitions/subtchallenge/virtual-urban-circuit/en#200305](https://robotika.cz/competitions/subtchallenge/virtual-urban-circuit/en#200305)
content.html:
OK, I checked the results from SubT Virtual Urban (BTW thanks for the new feature robot_paths.svg ), and it looked fine for the first 4 runs but then 20 runs were bad (the robot did not leave base station area, 5th run “on the edge”). I posted some pictures on:

https://robotika.cz/competitions/subtchallenge/virtual-urban-circuit/en#200305
